data.title: JR RAILWAY INFORMATION SYSTEMS CO.,LTD.
data.text:
①

We value people.

We value our customers and shareholders and constantly work to build trust between the two sides so that both can benefit from our business. We also value our employees as individuals and encourage them to express themselves through a spirit of trust and cooperation.

②

We want society to prosper.

By developing and operating IT systems related to the Japan Railways (JR) Group, transportation, logistics, tourism, and other areas, we want to help build a thriving and efficient social network.

③

We provide reliable,

high-quality services.

Using the advanced technologies and experience we have accumulated over the years, we strive to provide reliable services of the highest quality that incorporate the latest IT technologies.

ISO9001

We have obtained ISO9001 certification to guarantee a level of quality that will lead to even greater customer satisfaction.

ISO20000

We have obtained ISO20000 certification to further improve the quality and efficiency of our IT services.

Certificate of Data Center Security Compliance

We have obtained certification that meets the requirements of the Japan Electronics and Information Technology Association’s standards for IT system equipment and environments; the Center for Financial Industry Information Systems’ security standards for computer systems used by financial institutions, and the Japan Quality Assurance Organization’s standards for operating IT systems and related equipment.

ISO27001

We have obtained ISO27001 certification to further our rigorous management of information assets, and to ensure they are used appropriately.
